name: Space Survival (itch) (hassaanmunir)
description:
Hi Everyone,

I just started learning Unity3D a few weeks back and this game is from one of the projects in the course that I'm doing. I added some new features in it and polished it a little bit and here's the result.

So, please play this game and comment down; what do you think! As I'm new to game development, your opinions will be highly appreciated.

Cheers
